title: Adobe Enterprise Products: Guides for logging into Adobe applications
content: Select your Adobe product to access comprehensive instructions on logging in through Single Sign-On (SSO). You can log in directly to the Adobe.com site to access your applications. Please ensure that you select the Company or School account option and NOT the Personal account. For more information, refer to the Adobe.com Sign in document. We HIGHLY recommend signing directly into your desired application’s log in page. Note: This is to log into Adobe’s home panel, not a specific app.
